metadata.name: Honouring ceremony of Heris Karate Academy
metadata.description:
Honouring ceremony of Heris Karate Academy medalists - Kayson cultural and sports complex in Heris province

Heris cultural and sports complex was established after 2012 earthquake in the province of Heris, and has improved the condition of Karate in the region.
The present artwork is a gift from the active sportsmen of Heris Karate Academy to Kayson company to appreciate
their kind material and spiritual support in the process of their efforts dedicated to company's sustainable human development and CSR.

Producer: Mahdi Nazari
Year: June 2023
